home.about: A frontend developer passionate about creating interactive and responsive web applications. I enjoy exploring new technologies and tools to build modern and user-centric projects.

simplify.name: Simplify
simplify.description: Simplify is a sleek and intuitive to-do list app designed to help you manage your tasks with ease and clarity.
simplify.keyFeatures: Effortless Task and List Management, Colour-Coded Task Sorting, Smart Scheduling, Celebrate Success with Confetti!, Seamless and Secure User Authentication, Designed for All Devices

weather.name: Weather or Not
weather.description: Weather or Not is a modern weather application that allows users to search for and view real-time weather information for any city. By fetching data from the Weather API, the app provides users with up-to-date weather details, making it a reliable tool for both daily and long-term planning.
weather.keyFeatures: Real-Time Weather Information, Hourly & Weekly Forecasts, City Search with Auto-Suggestions, Dynamic Background (Day/Night), Temperature Unit Toggle (Celsius/Fahrenheit), Fully Responsive Design
